house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1971 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include private spa, fireplace, air conditioning, skylights, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Integrity Realtors RE/MAX Integrity Realtors
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Garage DoorOpener, Gazebo, Pantry, Skylights, Storage Space, Workshop
